CustomField.formula: IF ( SpecialEmployee__c , StandardWorkDay__c , WorkDay__c + AnnualLeaves__c + AdjustWorkDay__c + PrivilegeLeave__c + HolidayLeave__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Taxable Work Day = Work Day + Annual Leaves + Privilege Leave + Holiday Leave + Adjust Work Day
CustomField.label: Taxable Work Day
